name: Steam-Tunks
description:
Game about steam tanks in outer space, haunted by CTHULHU! Up to 10 players !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Made in 48h by 4 people who just met at Szczecin GryfJam (GameJam) :)

Try to survive 1 minute with couple of friends, we dare you!

CONTROLS:

Move - Left analog

Aim - Right analog

Jump - Left Bumper

Fire - Right Bumber
